overview: Sankalp Technology provides mlm software for network marketing business and sankalp working consistent more than 12 years in the multi-level marketing domain with expert software professionals. Sankalp is the cross more than 2000 mlm software installations all over the globe including india, usa, uk, south Africa, Bangladesh, Germany, Nigeria, Canada, Netherlands, Nepal, Pakistan, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, UAE, Russia, Egypt, Spain, Saudi Arabia, Japan, China, Brazil, Indonesia, Philippines, Portugal, Colombia, France, Australia, Italy, Ghana, Mexico, Switzerland, South Korea and many other countries. Sankalp is the brand name in mlm software and 75 software professional continuously working on the mlm software and upgrading latest technologies as well as added new features in the mlm software. Sankalp provides the mlm software including plans such as - Australian Binary, Tri Binary, Level Binary Plan, Volume Binary, Tower Binary, Matrix plan, Uni-Level Plan, Hybrid Plan, Board Plan, Step Break Plan, Level Plan, Growth Plan, Generation Plan, Tri Matrix Plan, Orbit Income Plan, Auto Fill Income Plans, Repurchase Income Plan and many other plans. With mlm software sankalp provides others softwares inbuilt in the mlm software which requires for running mlm marketing business smoothly like franchisee, cheque printing software, bulk sms software, multi currency, multi language, e-pin generator software, smart cards, complete web based mlm software, easy to use and operate mlm software, integration of payment gateway, E Commerce Software online store shopee software shopping cart, inventory management system, ewallet, website replication, export reports in word excel pdf format, mis reports, tds deducation and many other features as per the customers requirement for all types of multi-level marketing software. Anyone can join multi level marketing and earn money through network/ chain marketing. For joining mlm marketing business no need to any qualification, education criteria, no require specific time you can do that on your free time also. Sankalp Computers & Systems Pvt. Ltd.
